guide.introduction: This is a simple project you can make in seconds!
guide.introduction_rendered:
This is a simple project you can make in seconds!

Relevant parts
  • Toilet Paper Roll
  • Greaseproof Paper
Tools
  • Craft knife
  • Tape

lines.text: Flatten one end of the toilet roll centre as shown. The round end of the tube will be your mouthpiece.
lines.text_raw: Flatten one end of the toilet roll centre as shown. The round end of the tube will be your mouthpiece.

guide.summary: This instrument is an instrument that you hum into to make a sound!
guide.title: How to make a Kazoo
